ISSUE.TITLE: Issues with GitHub auth setting up v0.3
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Following the instructions in the readme, I created a new GitHub app. I placed the ID and key in the `drone.toml` file and made sure that the authorization callback URL was set accordingly (`/api/auth/github.com`). When attempting to login for the first time the process stops in the browser with the authorization callback URL in the address bar and the page is blank. The last thing written to the `drone.log` file is `usubscribed to subscription`.
